Gene.FullName: ADP ribosylation factor like GTPase 6 interacting protein 6
calcium voltage-gated channel auxiliary subunit beta 4
potassium inwardly rectifying channel subfamily J member 3
NEB-ARL5A intergenic CAGE-defined B cell enhancer
reprimo, TP53 dependent G2 arrest mediator homolog

SubmitterDescription.SubmitterName: International Standards For Cytogenomic Arrays Consortium (ISCA)

SampleDescription.Description: Phenotype: global developmental delay, behavioral and social interaction problems with reported recent deterioration, reported abnormal outside EEG

ClinicalAssertion.StudyDescription: Copy number variation identified through the course of routine clinical cytogenomic testing in postnatal populations, with clinical assertions as classified by the original submitter.
